bibl.title: Dryton's Wives: Two or Three?
bibl.note: There is sufficient reason to keep open the possibility that Dryton married X in 176/5, took Sarapias as his second wife ca. 160, and Apollonia alias Senmonthis as his third wife ca. 150 B.C.
bibl.seg: Lewis Naphtali, Dryton's Wives: Two or Three?
There is sufficient reason to keep open the possibility that Dryton married X in 176/5, took Sarapias as his second wife ca. 160, and Apollonia alias Senmonthis as his third wife ca. 150 B.C.
